name: Islam QA Urdu Nastaleeq
description:
This style is to be used with Urdu portion of Islam QA website for Nastaleeq Font.

These fonts are not my work, credit is due to all those contributors.
additional_info:
Fonts are chosen with the following order:
  • Jameel Khushkhat-L
  • Mehr Nastaliq Web
  • Alvi Nastaleeq
  • Jameel Noori Nastaleeq
  • Urdu Typesetting
  • Alvi Lahori Nastaleeq
  • Tahoma
